title: President Donald J. Trump Is Strengthening Efforts To Combat Drug Trafficking And Protect Our Communities – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
July 10, 2020
As governments and nations focus on the coronavirus, there’s a growing threat that cartels, criminals, terrorists, and other malign actors will try to exploit the situation for their own gain. And we must not let that happen.
						President Donald J. Trump
